 _ Later Days _

(( i dont even know what that mood means! ))

Here in this diary, I write you visions of my summer. It was the best I ever had! Okay, umm accually thats just the begining of one of The Ataris's songs. But heyy why not ;] Soo The Cape was fun =] me and bob got tight.. and i clearly think he awesome. We played baseball, volleyball, and football. Eh good times! =] Brooke left me umm Tuesday until Thursday [?] I believe. When she came back we went shopping and cool stuff like that. We went to the beach a lot. We like went to these rocks and we got stranded =[ so Bil came over and got the tube to save us! *weeeee* That was silly. Then we went again, but this time.. with WONDER SHOES! =] Oh yeah! ((note* not water shoes, but wonder shoes)) We saw that kid Lucas again. Me and Brooke met him one night. He was my age & from NY. He liked the Yankees. clearly.. i could never like him lol He was cool I guess. He liked to catch crabs! =[ That scared me. and so did his friend. his friend was cute, but kinda weird. Oh jezze, I got hit on =[ The 1st time on Main Street, and dad was right there. Thankfully he didnt hear though. Then some boys yelled at me from a car, Bobby enjoyed that one. Then we got in the car and Bobby told me it was my turn to yell at boys. Har Har! Then Thursday night Some kid with God damn SEXYYYY hair hit on me. He asked me if I wanted to touch his beatiful hair, and of course. I couldnt pass that one up! =] It was hmm so yummy, I love that curley hair. Its sooo.. mmm. okay so anyways.. lol Im never going to see that kid again.but I did enjoy his hair. =] I cant really think of anything speical that happened over vacation. hmm.. nope got nothing. Well me and bob watched a documenty on a porn star! =] Yeah! Good Timessss ;]And Brooke would not stop touching my ass. She wanted my boobs to but ehh thats kinda sketchy =] Well the other day me, booke, bobby, Lour, dad, and little fat satan. I mean Emily went tubing. It was soooo much fun! We got a new tube thats bigger thank god. So me and Brooke went on. We were singing about my dad and his pants. See my daddy dont dance he just ripps his pants and does the rip away... now rip back.. rip back. hmm good song. ReMix=] Well we laughed our ass's off and had a good god damn time. Speaking of ass's Brooke.. Jesus Christ.. I never saw someones ass as much as I saw hers on vacation! I had never been mooned so many times in my life. hmm.. Wellllll, nothing really speical or WHOW happened over vacation.. 6 flags.. beaches.. boat.. Cape.. All good times though.. But I think last summer was wicked funner.. But I really want to eat food and watch Sponge Bob. Tomorrow im suppost to get my kitty with Gram, But im not counting on it. =/ Every time we say yeah kitty! no kitty =[ but were accually going to look at kittys. Oh my fiel star depp <3 =] yeahhh.. bob said to name him Pudge.. lol cute but I like fiel =] Okay world.. I will let you know if i get my kitten. <3 

                      Wad up -world-        
Katieeeeeeeee (duh?)

P_s - aWall might be spending the night at my house and hopefully Lours tomorrow ;]

Hello Hello. Well okay I really am like having mood swings.. like 5 seconds ago I was going to write about how mad I am. Because Im not as strong as I thought I was. But then I just got in a good mood again.. For no reason, but mm I am thankful I am happy again. I miss Alison and I feel wicekd bad cause I always forget to write her!! I need to remember!! >=(! Well, tomorrow I am going to see The Lion King.. That broadway show. EKK!!! I dont want to go.. Butt my aunt got these tickets last year and they were a lot of $$. So I must try my hardest to like it. Maybe I will love it? I hope so though. Today I did an accual flip on my trampoline! Not my crappy fake ones.. like an accual one! =] I was so happy. Nothing really happened today. Me and Nicole watched "My girl" and CRIEEEDDDDDDDD so bad!! That movie was never so sad. Last night I got my phone! Its soo sick. The screen can flip and its a camera phone. Its soo cool, when say Nicole calls me, I have picture  of her on there, so it will show up when she calls ;] Its hott. Today wasnt wicked fun. I didnt really feel good and I still dont. Michelle taught me a new card game though. my dad had us watch the Olympics opening.. and the second the commerical came on we ran for our LIVES! but were going to play cards and pretend we like what hes making us watch.. Later Dater! ;]

xOx. Cub

Blah Blah Blah! Im angered because I just wrote a whole bunch of shit in here, and then, being the dumb shit I am, I unplugged it with my foot! *OHP* way to go me. =] Score one for the home team! Sooo let start over but with less detail because Im to lazy now! 3 days ago Christopher Fitsgerald Renyolds came over to see me and Lyssa Pants. We went cloud searching! =] We foundd hmmm, a rabbit, and a wolf looking thing I believe. then he headed home after a short period in time. I kinda got to fight him, but not the fight we have planned.. Cause I will kick his ass sometime! Oh I can, and I will. ;] The next day me and Lyssa just hung out. Then Billy came over and dad took us tubbing. It was friggen.. I dont even know.. like fun.. but not.. It was fun until like my foot like broke my crotch.. [[dont ask]] It would have been more fun if I was with Lyssa in the tube. BUT its small. It was funny though cause it was small so Trev couldnt really stay on it. It was fun overall I guess, but i really am scared shitless of things in the lake. Like the lockness monster or something. =[ and FISH! BAHH! But hey life usually goes on. Then we headed back here and Aimee came! *woot* We asked Colleen to go get us BK and she did =] We <3 you! Then us 4 headed for the trampoline. We saw shooting star [[ * ]] aww! =] Then Billy went home and we watched Big Fish while eating our yummy BK! =] That was a good movie yesh yesh. Except we did make fun of him becoming a large fish in a swimming pool BUT thats okay. We really didnt do anything that night. Just watched TV. The next day, thats ALL we did! We watched Joe Shmo 2 ALL day* It was awesome. We took a break to make soup and tuna =] yum yum! and feed the birds burnt bread! Oh we are such good citizens! Then A_dizzel went home, and me and Lyssa continued to watch Joe Shmo2! lol It was an all day marathon. =]! Then Aimee came back over to sleep here, but plans changed. We decied to shit this shin dig to her house. But Lyssa had to go to her step-moms house. I miss her already! =[!! But I am going to my stepmoms house tonight also. So its all good =] *woot* So me and Aimee went to help my dad get furinture with him and Lour. We went to some old ladies house. she was WEIRDDD AHH! You wanna pet my dog?! WHERES THE DOG.. in your hand faggot. Oh man. Crazy ol' women was she. We had a grand time though. Then we went to Aimees we watched Scary Movie 3. It was funny. Friggen Joesph threw open the door and gave Aimee a heart attack. It was silly. ;] Then he like went up to the window later on, and scared us.. again.. Jesus christtt.. Glenny too! a_holes! =] Then I talked to Eric for a short while on the phone. Hes going hiking today. I did infact have a mother f*ing good time making fun of him for that one! Being the good kid I am, I told him not to fall down the mountain! =] Then me and Aimee watched center stage and fell fast asleep.. Then I woke up and came home, and thats where my story ends. Hmm, I feel kinda like weird.. I dont really know why though. I didnt do anything wrong or do anything bad. I just feel weird.. :-/ HmmmmMmmmMmmm... Well Im going to my house tonight and maybe I can accually get het to take me out to dinner * y U m M y * diinneeerrrr.. I havnt eaten yet today and im HUNGRYYYY I do believe I am going to watch TV and eat.. something.. even though we have nothing to eat =[ blahT* Soooooooo Later Daterrrrr

 

xox. Cub .xox ;]

Love me for now ; or never

Okay so clearly Lisa didnt accually say that one. But she did say "Grab his pizza and run. It looked big" But thats not what we heard! So Monday morning comes along and me and Lyssa wake up and get ready for our Hampton Beach adventure. It was me, Lyssa, Mommy, Lisa, and Ashley. On the way there we were all,including the mommys, were car looking for guys. We saw some kid that they thought was cute (NOPE!) and there was an old fatty in the car. Ashley, being the good sport she is, said she would take him. Taking one for the team! When we got there we just beached it. Then Me Lyssa and Ashley went for a walk. and we saw Matt and Eric! How weird is that? Accually, not weird at all since we planned it the night before. So, we just beached it and then went to the hotel pool. I must admit I harassed the kids in the pool. I told them I couldnt touch the bottom, and asked if they had balls. The rules clearly stated no ball playing was allowed. ;] Just keeping everyone one in check. Oh and Me, being Mr.Smooth, smashed my mouth on the side of the pool. It was hott. Nice and Bloody! Hmm go me! =]Then us Ladies got ready while the boys ate. We had to get ready for the Brandy concert. Then I hung out with Matt and Eric until they left. =] Then us ladies headed to do a little shoppin' and then to the concert. Okay so we see a bunch of white guys come and they start playing so were like they must be an opener for Brandy?? HaHa NOPE! this band is called Brandy.. haha it was so funny but we had a fun times anyways.. We still danced around cause they had some good songs..=] good times. then we headed to the strip =]! WooT! We had some kids look at us and mom was like "Keep your eyes in your head thats my daughters!" they were Like aww sorry! Then she laughs and goes HAHA JUST KIDDING! She told everyone that story.. even the guy that holds the door at the hotel. Which she hooked up with Ashley. lol Good times. Then the mommys headed to the beach to drink wine. so me and ashley and Lyssa walked the strip.. and we can some creepy people.. drunks and horny little buggers.. so we headed back to the beach with the mommys.. and we saw thee coolest thing everrr it like pick up trash =] It was cool. and these kids were walking by and they thought they we were yelling to them.. so they like came over lol.. we just walked on the beach for awhile with them.. but seeing as it was like 1:30 at night mommys wanted us to go to sleepy. So everyone went to sleep but ohhh noo not me and Lyssa. We went on a stake out on the porch! haha. Some guy called the cops so we were like listening but we couldnt hear cause the AC came on.. Damn that AC.. So we made up a story.. So a gorilla that was "THIS BIG AND PREGNANT" was comming at him. =] Good story if I do say so myself ;] Then we just went to bed cause he left us, and there was no more means of entertainment. The next day we were beach bums. They our friends from the night before came with us shopping =] I got a sweatshirt, 2 shirts, and skirt. I love them all. and I got eric something cause he said he needed it.. but I cannot say what it tis. Cause its a sHHH secret. Then we kinda sorta ditched them.. SORRY! Then some boys told us they wanted to teach us how to surf.. but they were in a car sooo lol  After a while we just headed home.. Sooo I get home for like 20 mins. no one is home then I see Grammy.. as soon as I see her she tells me to pack cause were going to the cottage.. So we hop in the car and away we went to Aunts Nancy cottage we go. So we get there and we played 31 it was up to me and Gena.. Damn her she won.. so I told her we would Rummy 500 it. But we quit and looked at Pictures.. then I watched Kim Possiable then slept. The next day we went to OLD SILVERRRR I love this beach so much. Its the best beach everrrr.. I tanned and swam with Gena all day. I was hope[ing] I would see johnny but the fucker didnt bring his cell. But I forgive him.. even though I am holding that grudge Johnny.. and I still owe you for you telling your mom I was was a LOTR fan.. lol I miss Johnny though. I havnt seen him since midnight madness. But I did not. He was with Christina Cambelle. "shes a sight, if your blind" oh Norris Face. lol But there was this life guard.. and he was like 17 and he had sexy hair!! =] So Gene, being the wonderful cousin she is, tried to swim out past the bouy so that he would look at me. haha shes so silly. I love it.. Shes the only almost 30 year old that acts my age =]! I love her. and I think she should move outa wisconsin. and here with me =]But I got a killer tan! and I love it sooo much!! =] Then we headed back to the cottage, and they ate dinner while I slept. I wanted to go to Lyssa's tonight to help paint but stupid dad went to Lour's house so I had no ride. but were doing something tomorrow =]Im soooo excited.. were going to 6 flags on Saturday now.. but thats okay even though its going to be crowded but Saturday is suppost to be nice and tomorrow isnt soo its all gravy. but I get to see her tomorrowww =]!! and her new room. Woottt.. But now I will shower and eat and sleep fast so I can see Lyssa sooner ;] LoL. Okayy world.. G-night. <3 Da' beach bum

Okay so last night.. Lyssa slept over. and Trev had Joe sleep over too. So clearly, we put makeup on Joe. He is such a hott girl. I got kinda jelous. [[we have pictures]] ;] We also have picture of us.. modeling. =] Yeahh we fine. So today was funnn. Me and Lyssa woke up at.. 1:30. Way to be. Then we just went on the trampoline and swimming. We also sat on the boat. Then we went running... to Dunkin Donuts. But thats okay.. Then Jerm picked us up on the way home because our hands were filled with food. We now worship him =] thank you Jerm. Then Me Trev Diana and Joe took the boat out. Joe.. is seriously.. the funniest kid ever. He makes the best faces and looks like a true retard. Trev like hit some waves and Joe like made himself bounce wicked high and like threw his coffee off. You had to be there, but I never laughed so hard in my life. Joe is seriously thee funniest kid ever. and hes nice. He got me soda and an enegry drink! THANKS JOE! =]! Then we went out with Lour dad emily. I drove the boat. why am I so pimp? I just dont know. We went to WB the other day. We went to Bobs and I got etnies for.. hmm 12 dollars. whoot* Me and sarah had the same shoes. That was so funny. Then I got to see James Thomas Peck! =]!!!! I miss him sooo much! Hes all punk and cute. And he has the cutest puppy everrrr =] It sniffed my ass. Good times [?]I also got to see Stephaine! :) Then me and lyssa went to Michelles home. We had Mac and Cheese and watched The Sweetest thing. It was so funny. Your to big to fit in here.. To big to fit in here.. To big to fit in here *moan moan moan* My body is a movie and your penis is the star. ;] Aww such good times. HAHA then we like vultured the Bingo Hall. hahahahaaha. we went all like secret agent, and was ducking under windows and shit.. then some old bitch turned on her lights. It was so funny. We were spotted. But then Gram came out and went home to Webster.It was so funny. but Im out. me and lyssa are going to do.. anything. ;]

HaHa. Oh man. Last night I went to Lyssas house. We acted like we were deaf. and We were pretty good at it. I knew some signs because of McKinley. =] I think last night was like, one of the best nights ever. We didnt really do anything stupendus. BUT at 1 in the morning we went outside in the POURING rain! I love the rain so much and I love Alyssa so much so it was awesome. Shes a really good puddle jumper. We just danced and yes, even sang in the rain =] It was so much fun. It was a little to much like a movie. lol But it was awesome. Eric got pissed at me last night. Wonderful eh? Buttt I cant really do anything about that one. I tried and hes still mad..
